title: Hanbury Park
description: Hanbury Park is a tale of romance, friendship, family and conflict set in Cwmbran, South Wales. It follows the story of Abbie who meets the man of her dreams at a party. Unfortunately he happens to be her second cousin and even though they spend a perfect, magical summer together, her family and friends disapprove of him until eventually their relationship is torn apart. Abbie's life then spirals into despair, she ends up with a man she doesnt want to be with, he is cold and cruel and isolates her more and more from the life she once had. After a cruel twist of fate, she has to watch the man she loves, love someone else while Abbie's marriage has become so bleak and dark, it may cost her, her life.
author: Carol Ann Lewis
